short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and Easy to Remember Password Generator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate simple and easy to use and remember passwords for customers, or yourself.

Click roll and you get a randomised two word password based of the diceware wordlist

Click copy and, well, it copies the password to your clipboard.

Have fun and stay safe ;)

Update: 
version 0.3:
    - fixed NaN bug
    - added capitalisation

version 0.2:

    - some style updates
